is event which is genrated when a contribution voting has came to an end and the contribution is accepted","params":{"contributionId":"This is the id of the contribution to which the record is related to ","recordId":"This is the id of the record to which this contribution relates to ","rewardCommunity":"The reward amount for comunity tokens","rewardGovernance":"The reward amount for governance tokens ","to":"This the address of the winner or the owner of the contribution "}},"NewTokenCreated(uint256,string,string,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8)":{"details":"this is event which is created when new governance token is created (NEW CREATION Not MINITING)","params":{"creationDate":"This is the creation date of the token ","image":"This is the image of the token ","recordId":"This is the record Id to which this token belongs to ","symbol":"This is the symbol of the governance token","tokenAmount":"This is the amount of token that are created ","tokenId":"This is the id of token that is newly created tokens ","tokenType":"This is the type of the token that is created => For governance 1 and for copyright 0  "}},"TokenMinted(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"this is event which is created when new governance token is minted after the voting is done","params":{"creationDate":"This is the creation date of the token ","recordId":"This is the record Id to which this token belongs to ","tokenAmount":"This is the amount of token that are created ","tokenId":"This is the id of token that is newly created tokens "}},"TokenTransfer(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,string)":{"details":"this is event which is created when a token transfer takes place","params":{"amount":"This is the amount of token transfered ","from":"This is the address of sender ","symbol":"This is the symbol of the token that were transfered","to":"This is the address of reciver ","tokenId":"This is the id of the token that is being transfered ","transferDate":"This is the date of the transfer"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address."},"balanceOfAt(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Retrieves the balance of `account` at the time `snapshotId` was created."},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length."},"createNewCommunityToken((uint256,uint256,uint256,string,string))":{"details":"This function creats new community tokens for specified record","params":{"newTokenData":"This contains all the parameters needed to create a new community token that are - recordId This is the recordId that for new token - totalSupply This is the total supply of community token - userBalance This is the amount of tokens that user wants to keep to himself - symbol This is the symbol of the community token - image this is image of the gov token."}},"createNewGovernanceToken((uint256,uint256,uint256,string,string))":{"details":"This function creats new governance tokens for specified record","params":{"newTokenData":"This contains all the parameters needed to create a new governance token that are - recordId This is the recordId that for new token - totalSupply This is the total supply of governance token - userBalance This is the amount of tokens that user wants to keep to himself - symbol This is the symbol of the gvernance token - image this is image of the gov token."}},"exists(uint256)":{"details":"Indicates whether any token exist with a given id, or not."},"getCommunityTokenId(uint256)":{"details":"This function gives you the community token id of the recordId that you pass","params":{"recordId":"This is the Id of the token that you want to check"}},"getGovernanceTokenId(uint256)":{"details":"This function gives you the governance token id of the recordId that you pass","params":{"recordId":"This is the Id of the token that you want to check"}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-isApprovedForAll}."},"mintTokens(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"this function is responsible for minting of new tokens for records","params":{"amount":"the amount that is to be minted","tokenId":"Id this is the tokenId that is to minted"}},"mintTokens(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"This function creats new community tokens for specified record","params":{"recordId":"This is the id of the record to which the token belongs to","tokenAmount":"This is the amount that is to be minted","tokenId":"This is the id of the which is to be minted"}},"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"Handles the receipt of a multiple ERC1155 token types. This function is called at the end of a `safeBatchTransferFrom` after the balances have been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer(s), this must return `bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)\"))` (i.e. 0xbc197c81, or its own function selector).","params":{"data":"Additional data with no specified format","from":"The address which previously owned the token","ids":"An array containing ids of each token being transferred (order and length must match values array)","operator":"The address which initiated the batch transfer (i.e. msg.sender)","values":"An array containing amounts of each token being transferred (order and length must match ids array)"},"returns":{"_0":"`bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)\"))` if transfer is allowed"}},"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Handles the receipt of a single ERC1155 token type. This function is called at the end of a `safeTransferFrom` after the balance has been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer, this must return `bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)\"))` (i.e. 0xf23a6e61, or its own function selector).","params":{"data":"Additional data with no specified format","from":"The address which previously owned the token","id":"The ID of the token being transferred","operator":"The address which initiated the transfer (i.e. msg.sender)","value":"The amount of tokens being transferred"},"returns":{"_0":"`bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)\"))` if transfer is allowed"}},"safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeBatchTransferFrom}."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeTransferFrom}."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-setApprovalForAll}."},"setContributionVotingContractAddress(address)":{"details":"This function sets the Voting Contract address"},"setDilutionContract(address)":{"details":"This function sets the dilution Contract address"},"setRecordsContractAddress(address)":{"details":"This function sets the Records Contract address"},"setVotingHubContract(address)":{"details":"This function sets the Records Contract address"},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"totalCirculatingSupply(uint256)":{"details":"This function returns the amount of total tokens that are in circulation","params":{"tokenId":"This is the token whoes circulating supply you  want to find out"}},"totalSupply(uint256)":{"details":"Total amount of tokens in with a given id."},"totalSupplyAt(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Retrieves the total supply at the time `snapshotId` was created."},"transferRewardAmount(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"This function is called only by the voting contract once the voting ends","params":{"contributionId":"this is the contribution id to which the user has won","recordId":"This is the recordId to which the contribution belongs to","rewardCommunity":"this is the amout of comunity token that needs to be transfered","rewardGovernance":"this is the amout of Governance token that needs to be transfered","to":"This is the recivers address"}},"uri(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\\{id\\}` substring with the actual token type @dev This function creats new governance tokens for specified record
 @param newTokenData This contains all the parameters needed to create a new governance token that are
 - recordId This is the recordId that for new token
 - totalSupply This is the total supply of governance token
 - userBalance This is the amount of tokens that user wants to keep to himself
 - symbol This is the symbol of the gvernance token
 - image this is image of the gov token.

ContributionRewardTransfered(address,uin.details: this is event which is genrated when a contribution voting has came to an end and the contribution is accepted

params.contributionId: This is the id of the contribution to which the record is related to
params.recordId: This is the id of the record to which this contribution relates to
params.rewardCommunity: The reward amount for comunity tokens
params.rewardGovernance: The reward amount for governance tokens
params.to: This the address of the winner or the owner of the contribution

NewTokenCreated(uint256,string,string,ui.details: this is event which is created when new governance token is created (NEW CREATION Not MINITING)

params.creationDate: This is the creation date of the token
params.image: This is the image of the token
params.recordId: This is the record Id to which this token belongs to
params.symbol: This is the symbol of the governance token
params.tokenAmount: This is the amount of token that are created
params.tokenId: This is the id of token that is newly created tokens
params.tokenType: This is the type of the token that is created => For governance 1 and for copyright 0

TokenMinted(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.details: this is event which is created when new governance token is minted after the voting is done

params.creationDate: This is the creation date of the token
params.recordId: This is the record Id to which this token belongs to
params.tokenAmount: This is the amount of token that are created
params.tokenId: This is the id of token that is newly created tokens

TokenTransfer(address,address,uint256,ui.details: this is event which is created when a token transfer takes place

params.amount: This is the amount of token transfered
params.from: This is the address of sender
params.symbol: This is the symbol of the token that were transfered
params.to: This is the address of reciver
params.tokenId: This is the id of the token that is being transfered
params.transferDate: This is the date of the transfer

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfAt(address,uint256,uint256).details: Retrieves the balance of `account` at the time `snapshotId` was created.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

createNewCommunityToken((uint256,uint256.details: This function creats new community tokens for specified record

params.newTokenData: This contains all the parameters needed to create a new community token that are - recordId This is the recordId that for new token - totalSupply This is the total supply of community token - userBalance This is the amount of tokens that user wants to keep to himself - symbol This is the symbol of the community token - image this is image of the gov token.

createNewGovernanceToken((uint256,uint25.details: This function creats new governance tokens for specified record

params.newTokenData: This contains all the parameters needed to create a new governance token that are - recordId This is the recordId that for new token - totalSupply This is the total supply of governance token - userBalance This is the amount of tokens that user wants to keep to himself - symbol This is the symbol of the gvernance token - image this is image of the gov token.

exists(uint256).details: Indicates whether any token exist with a given id, or not.

getCommunityTokenId(uint256).details: This function gives you the community token id of the recordId that you pass

params.recordId: This is the Id of the token that you want to check

getGovernanceTokenId(uint256).details: This function gives you the governance token id of the recordId that you pass

params.recordId: This is the Id of the token that you want to check

mintTokens(uint256,uint256).details: this function is responsible for minting of new tokens for records

params.amount: the amount that is to be minted
params.tokenId: Id this is the tokenId that is to minted

mintTokens(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: This function creats new community tokens for specified record

params.recordId: This is the id of the record to which the token belongs to
params.tokenAmount: This is the amount that is to be minted
params.tokenId: This is the id of the which is to be minted

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.details: Handles the receipt of a multiple ERC1155 token types. This function is called at the end of a `safeBatchTransferFrom` after the balances have been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer(s), this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xbc197c81, or its own function selector).

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.ids: An array containing ids of each token being transferred (order and length must match values array)
params.operator: The address which initiated the batch transfer (i.e. msg.sender)
params.values: An array containing amounts of each token being transferred (order and length must match ids array)

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.details: Handles the receipt of a single ERC1155 token type. This function is called at the end of a `safeTransferFrom` after the balance has been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer, this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xf23a6e61, or its own function selector).

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.id: The ID of the token being transferred
params.operator: The address which initiated the transfer (i.e. msg.sender)
params.value: The amount of tokens being transferred

setContributionVotingContractAddress(add.details: This function sets the Voting Contract address

setDilutionContract(address).details: This function sets the dilution Contract address

setRecordsContractAddress(address).details: This function sets the Records Contract address

setVotingHubContract(address).details: This function sets the Records Contract address

totalCirculatingSupply(uint256).details: This function returns the amount of total tokens that are in circulation

params.tokenId: This is the token whoes circulating supply you  want to find out

totalSupply(uint256).details: Total amount of tokens in with a given id.

totalSupplyAt(uint256,uint256).details: Retrieves the total supply at the time `snapshotId` was created.

transferRewardAmount(address,uint256,uin.details: This function is called only by the voting contract once the voting ends

params.contributionId: this is the contribution id to which the user has won
params.recordId: This is the recordId to which the contribution belongs to
params.rewardCommunity: this is the amout of comunity token that needs to be transfered
params.rewardGovernance: this is the amout of Governance token that needs to be transfered

uri(uint256).details: See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\{id\}` substring with the actual token type ID.
